english.segment1: My beautiful boy. Holiness I see. Perfect so pure. Your eyes they trust in me
english.segment2: All creation bows to You. The skies sing Your arriving. My precious Jesus
english.segment3: And You will walk this land. My precious gift from God. Showing all mankind. The only way to life
english.segment4: All creation sings Your praise. The angels will proclaim. My precious Jesus
